column1: I  will  proceed  to  examine  the  facts  and  relevant  statutory  provisions
pertaining to the above issue. There is a consensus that the Respondent's
income tax return for the year of assessment 2011/2012 was submitted on
13th  December  2012.  Upon  submitting  a  return,  Section  163(3)  of  the
Inland Revenue Act comes into effect. The wording of Section 163 (3) is
